verses.1: Tua ciangin vantungmi in Pasian le Tuuno tokhom panin a hong luang khia, kristal suangmanpha bangin a tee selsel gun tui hong lak a,
verses.2: khuapi sung lampi laizang ah a luang hi. Tua gun pang tuakah nuntakna singkung po a, kha simin gah ahih manin kum khat sungin sawm le nih vei a gah hi. A tehte zong natna dam nading zatui-in kizang hi.
verses.3: Pasianʼ samsiatna a ngah peuhpeuh tua khua sungah om lo hi. Tua khuapi sungah Pasian le Tuunoʼ tokhom om dinga, ama nasemte in amah a bia ding uh hi.
verses.4: Amaute in ama maitang mu ding uh a, a taltang tung uh ah ama min kigelh ding hi.
verses.5: Topa Pasian pen amauteʼ khuavak hi-in, a tawntungin amaute in uk paisuak ding uh ahih manin khuamial hun cih om nawn lo dinga, khua a vaksak ding meivak le nitaang cihte kisam lo ding uh hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin vantungmi in kei kiangah, “Hih thute muantaak a, thuman ahi hi. Kamsangte tungah a Kha Siangtho a pia Topa Pasian in a hong piang baih ding thute, a nasemte tungah a lak dingin a vantung mite a hong sawl hi,” hong ci hi.
verses.7: Jesu in, “Kei a hong pai baih ta ding ka hi hi. Hih laibu sunga kigelh thu a zui mite mi hampha ahi hi,” a hong ci hi.
verses.8: Keimah Johan in hih thute za-in ka muh ahi hi. Hih thute za-in ka muh ciangin hih thute kei tungah a hong lak vantungmi a bia dingin a khe phung ah ka bok suk hi.
verses.9: Ahi zongin amah in, “Kei hong bia kei in. Kei pen nang le na sanggamte le hih laibu sungah a om thu a zui mite tawh nasem khawm khat ka hi hi. Pasian bia in,” hong ci hi.
verses.10: Tua ciangin vantungmi in kei kiangah, “Hih laibu sungah a kigelh thute a tun ding hong nai ta ahih manin imcip kei in.
verses.11: A gilo mite gilo lailai henla, a kihhuai gamtatte kihhuai gamtat lailai henla, a hoih gamtatte hoih gamtat lailai henla, a siangtho mite a siangtho mah hi lailai tahen!” hong ci hi.
verses.12: Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Kei ka hong pai baih ta dinga, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.
verses.13: Kei pen a masa le a nunung, a kipatna le a tawpna a cihnopna ahi Alfa le Omega ka hi hi,” a hong ci hi.
verses.14: Khuapi kulh kongpi sungah a lut theih nading le nuntakna singgah a nek theih nadingun a puan uh a siangin a sawp mite, mi hampha ahi uh hi.
verses.15: Ahi zongin a lampial mite, aisan mite, a paktat mite, mi thatte, milim biate le zuaugen nuamsa-in zuau a gengen mite, khuapi pua lamah a om uh hi.
verses.16: “Keimah Jesu in pawlpite adingin hih thute nang kiangah a hong gen dingin ka vantungmi ka hong sawl hi. Kei pen Davidʼ zung le a suan ahi, zingsol ka hi hi,” a hong ci hi.
verses.17: Kha Siangtho le Mothak in Jesu kiangah, “Hong pai in,” a ci uh hi. Hih thu a za mi khempeuh in zong Jesu aw, “Hong pai in,” ci ta uh hen. A dangtak mi khempeuh hong pai uh henla, a deih khempeuh in nuntakna tui a khongin hong la ta uh hen.
verses.18: Keimah Johan in hih laibu sungah a kigelh thu a za mi khempeuh ka hong hilhkholh nopna panin: A thu a behlap na om uh leh Pasian in zong hih laibu sungah a kigelh gimnate note tungah hong behlap dinga,
verses.19: hih laibu sungah a kigelh thute a hem khia na om uh leh Pasian in zong hih laibu sungah a kigelh nuntakna singgah le Khuapi Siangtho sungah na ngah ding uh hamphatnate note kiang panin hong hepkhiatsak ding hi.
verses.20: Hih thu khempeuh hong genin teci a pang mipa in, “Ka hong pai baih taktak ding hi,” hong ci hi. Na cih bangin hi tapeuh hen. Topa Jesu aw, hong pai ta in!
verses.21: Topa Jesu hong hehpihna thupha, note khempeuh tungah hong om tahen. Amen.
